Breakfast.info: All orders comes with the option of being served with a side of eggs and toast. Toast can be changed to sasuage or bacon.

items.name: Pancakes
items.desc: A serving of 2 large pancakes.

items.name: Waffles
items.desc: A serving of 3 waffles

items.name: Egg Sandwich
items.desc: Has English muffins and can be ordered with bacon.

items.desc: Eggs and veggies wraped in a tortilla

Salads.info: All salads comes with lettuce and tomatos.

items.name: Chicken Salad

items.name: Avocado Vegetable Salad

Charbroiled Burgers.info: All of our burgers are 1/4 lb. with lettuce, tomatos, onions, pickles, and thousand island dressing. They are served with white or wheat buns. You can also order a no bun lettuce wrapped burger.

items.name: Double Cheeseburger
items.desc: Double beef patty burger.

items.name: Hamburger
items.desc: A classic single beef patty burger.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.desc: Burger with cheddar cheese.

items.name: Egg & Vegetable Burger
items.desc: Has egg and spinich.

items.name: Double Bacon Burger
items.desc: Burger with two beef patties and more bacon.

Sandwiches.info: Sandwiches can be made with sliced bread (white or wheat bread) or a bigger bolillo bread.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
